mapper.update: UPDATE client_tbl set c_name = #{c_name}, c_pwd = #{c_pwd}, c_email = #{c_email}, c_phone = #{c_phone} where c_id = #{c_id}
mapper.select: SELECT r_num, TO_CHAR(r_reservedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') r_reserveDate, TO_CHAR(r_enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') r_endDate, r_floor, r_room, r_price, r_company, r_status FROM reservation_tbl WHERE c_id = #{c_id} AND r_status = '0' ORDER BY r_num DESC

SELECT r_num, TO_CHAR(r_reservedate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') r_reserveDate, TO_CHAR(r_enddate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') r_endDate, r_floor, r_room, r_price, r_company, r_status FROM reservation_tbl WHERE c_id = #{c_id} AND r_status IN ('1', '2') ORDER BY r_num DESC
